recipes: If this expedition succeeds, the I-that-is-not-I will be there to perform the Forms. [If you succeed, you'll reap the usual rewards, and also progress your Change ascension.]

If I add at least one Funds, I can begin the Expedition. [Expeditions need at least one Funds per obstacle. Followers will defeat obstacles. If you run out of Funds or Followers, the Expedition ends.]
If I add a Follower, I can begin the Expedition. [Expeditions need at least one Funds per obstacle. Followers will defeat obstacles. If you run out of Funds or Followers, the Expedition ends.]
I could send an Expedition here to find books, treasures, tools of power. But I'll need Followers to send, and Funds to supply them.
